name: Pork Chops Ni,coise
keywords: black olives, canned plum tomatoes, green pepper, pork, pork chops, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 cup canned Italian plum tomatoes, chopped
2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil (or 1/2 teaspoon dried)
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Wipe the chops dry with paper towels and dredge lightly with flour.
Heat the oil in a heavy skillet large enough to hold the chops comfortably. Brown the chops on both sides.

Add the tomatoes, garlic, onion, pepper and basil and simmmer for 20 minutes, turning the chops once. Add the olives and cook for 10 minutes, or until the chops are tender but not dried out. Serve hot.
